"★12 Unit Skill Addition":
"A ★12 unit (armor) can have a Unit Skill added to it by synthesizing a Skill Ring into it.

You can have up to three Unit Skills equipped, one each in your
Arm, Leg and Rear slots.

※Only L Rings can be used as material for this process."
"To add a Unit Skill, select \"<yellow>Unit Skill Addition<c>\" at the Item Lab, then select the ★12 unit to use as a base and the Skill Ring whose skill you want it to have."

"The Skill Ring used as material will disappear, but its Ring Skill will be added to the selected ★12 unit.

※The Unit Skill's level will be equal to the level of the Ring Skill at the time of synthesis.

※You cannot raise the level of a Ring Skill after you have made it into a Unit Skill. Grind your Skill Ring to raise its skill's level first.

※Adding a Ring Skill to a ★12 unit will Owner Register the unit."
